aka: Animal Planet Channel: Monsters Inside Me
动物星球频道：体内的怪物

cast.name: 斯蒂芬妮·古尔德 Stephanie Gould

trans_title: 体内的怪物 第一季
Animal Planet Channel: Monsters Inside Me
动物星球频道：体内的怪物
introduction: Some of the most horrifying creatures on the planet are ones that are too small to see! Get a glimpse of these monsters in the new show "Monsters Inside Me" , premiering Wednesday, July 1 at 9 p.m. only on Animal Planet!Season 11 :01x01 - Sleeper Cells (Jul/01/2009)An examination of how slo-acting organisms can wreak havoc on the human body.2 :01x02 - Outbreak (Jul/08/2009)A closer look at the parasite outbreaks from across the U.S.3 :01x03 - Sex Maniacs (Jul/15/2009)A look at the different strategies parasites use to reproduce, including bed bug infestations, maggots growing in a man's scalp, and parasitic worms breeding in the human lungs.4 :01x04 - Masters of Disguise (Jul/22/2009)A closer look into the parasites which are hard to identify which leads to deceptive symptoms such as Acanthamoeba keratitis, babesiosis and the Strongyloides worm.5 :01x05 - Hijackers (Jul/29/2009)An innocent child becomes the next victim of a vicious parasite on the rampage in Virginia. In Michigan a traveler's blood is invaded by a brutal killer and a summer's day at a lake in Florida becomes a nightmare when a ruthless monster attacks a boy's brain.6 :01x06 - Living with the Enemy (Aug/05/2009)A young woman's brain is attacked by parasites in Virginia. Also, a look at the life-threatening infections in the Midwest and New York.
chinese_title: 体内的怪物 第一季
